resources.string: No.113, Bidharahalli, Virgonagar, Bangalore - 560049, Near East Point College

The Casualty Department works round the clock. There is a separate emergency section of OBG department which is attached to labor room. The casualty is equipped with 10 beds having Central Oxygen Supply, Central Suction, Defibrillator, Pulse Oxymeter, Ambu Bag, Disaster Trolley and Crash Carts. It is connected to a minor operation theatre and two emergency operation theatres which is fully equipped with Anesthesia, Resuscitation and Surgical equipment. The Radiology department and clinical laboratories are placed close to the casualty to serve emergency patients round the Clock Timing: 24X7

In Bangalore, Varthur Government Hospital is a recognized name in patient care. They are one of the well-known Public Hospitals in Varthur. Backed with a vision to offer the best in patient care and equipped with technologically advanced healthcare facilities, they are one of the upcoming names in the healthcare industry. Located in , this hospital is easily accessible by various means of transport. A team of well-trained medical staff, non-medical staff and experienced clinical technicians work round-the-clock to offer various services . Their professional services make them a sought after Public Hospitals in Bangalore. A team of doctors on board, including specialists are equipped with the knowledge and expertise for handling various types of medical cases.
